title: I Reasonably Suspect That My Cat Is My Ex-Boyfriend - Novel Updates
tags: Childhood Friends   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Modern Day   Poor Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Short Story   Sickly Characters   Terminal Illness
author: 夜行灯花宵
description:
——Let me think about it, since when did I start to suspect that my cat is my ex-boyfriend?
Probably the day after the cat was picked up.

Our meticulous man makes assumptions to show evidence. Is ten enough?>
